name: Alien Invasion: White House Down
description:
A group of aliens have taken the war to the White House in their last attempt to gain control of the new world order.

President Obama has ordered a strike against these aliens with all forces available.

Download this game now!

Features:
- 2 heroes to choose from
- Tap on the left to jump, tap on the right to fire
- Coin shop
- Collect coins
- Game center
- Cool and entertaining music

Download this game now!
